  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205402</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Through the Lens: Kerry Laitala</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Durch das Objektiv: Kerry Laitala</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Par l'objectif : Kerry Laitala</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Através da lente: Kerry Laitala</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tramite l'obiettivo: Kerry Laitala</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μέσω του φακού: Kerry Laitala</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">A través de la lente: Kerry Laitala</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">SPARK watches experimental filmmaker Kerry Laitala's painstaking process as she works on her ongoing tribute to the film medium itself, The Muse of Cinema. This Educator Guide is about the history of experimental and avant-garde filmmaking.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">FUNKEN überwacht experimentellen Filmemacher 
Kerry Laitalas sorgfältigen Prozeß, während sie auf ihrem 
fortwährenden Tribut zum Filmmedium selbst arbeitet, das MUSE des 
Kinos. Diese Erzieher-Anleitung ist über die Geschichte von 
experimentellem und von Avantgarde filmmaking.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'ÉTINCELLE observe le processus soigneux de 
réalisateur de film de Laitala expérimental de kerry pendant qu'elle
travaille à son hommage continu au support de film lui-même, le MUSE
du cinéma. Ce guide d'éducateur est au sujet de l'histoire 
d'expérimental et de l'avant-garde filmmaking.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A FAÍSCA presta atenção ao processo painstaking
enquanto trabalha em seu tributo ongoing ao media da película 
próprio, o MUSE de Laitala experimental do kerry do filmmaker do 
cinema. Esta guia do educador é sobre o history de experimental
e do avant-garde que filmmaking.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La SCINTILLA guarda il processo scrupoloso mentre 
lavora al suo tributo continuo al media della pellicola in se, il MUSE
del filmmaker del Laitala sperimentale di kerry del cinematografo. 
Questa guida dell'educatore è circa la storia di sperimentale e
del avant-garde che filmmaking.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο ΣΠΙΝΘΗΡΑΣ προσέχει την πειραματική kerry Laitala
παραγωγών ταινιών προσεκτική διαδικασία όπως εργάζεται στον 
τρέχοντα φόρο της το ίδιο στο μέσο, η μούσα ταινιών του 
κινηματογράφου. Αυτός ο οδηγός εκπαιδευτικών είναι για την 
ιστορία πειραματικός και πρωτοπορίας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La CHISPA mira el proceso cuidadoso como ella 
trabaja en su tributo en curso al media de la película sí mismo, el 
MUSE del cineasta de Laitala experimental del kerry del cine. 
Esta guía del educador está sobre la historia de filmmaking 
experimental y vanguardista.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
